name: Sucrose
desc:
"Harmless Sweetie" Sucrose

"You can't rate the strength of an as-yet untested deck!"

imgDesc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 3 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , the target is forcibly switched to the previous character.

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , summons 1 <color=#ffffff>Large Wind Spirit</color> .

<color=#ece5d8>Large Wind Spirit</color>
<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase</color> : Deal 2 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 3</color>
After your character or Summon triggers a Swirl reaction: Convert the Elemental Type of this card and change its DMG dealt to the element Swirled. (Can only be converted once before leaving the field)

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

customize.name: Sucrose
customize.desc:
"Harmless Sweetie" Sucrose

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Carta animata vuota
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I've only just learned the rules of this game, but I'll do my best..."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Sucrose's deck has "Swirl" at the cord of its build, and she also has Artifacts with various effects on hand.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I've committed the rules to heart, and I've also accumulated lots of experimental data from my matches. I shouldn't lose this time..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Sucrose" starts with the Talent Card "Chaotic Entropy" equipped.</color>
